H0.text: Which of the Kray brothers died first. Reggie

H1.text: Which of the Kray brothers died first. Charlie Kray

H2.text: Which of the Kray brothers died first. Frank Mitchell

H3.text: Which of the Kray brothers died first. Ronnie

A4.text: Ronnie suffered a heart attack at Broadmoor Hospital on 15 March 1995, and died two days later at the age of 61 at Wexham Park Hospital in Slough, Berkshire.
